maui.main
Class MauiWrapperFactory

java.lang.Object
  maui.main.MauiWrapperFactory

public class MauiWrapperFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This class loads several vocabularies and models simultaneously. Then all of them can be applied to generate topics from a given text.

Author:
alyona
